title: Botox & Beauty Garden Party
description:
💐 Step through the garden gate and into your glow-up!
⛲️ Join Splendid Beauty Bar & Co. + Dermal Knowledge for our whimsical Botox & Beauty Garden Party — now featuring a sparkling appearance by The Welded Roe & Charm Bar with permanent jewelry!

🦋 Thursday, June 5th
3:00 PM – 6:00 PM
Dermal Knowledge
2023 Grayson Hwy, Unit 201, Grayson, GA
ALL BOTOX INQUIRIES & BOOKINGS: 678-359-2212

🪻 What’s blooming at the party:
• Discounted Botox by master injector Shelly Mauldin, MSN, FNP
• FREE consultations with internationally awarded artists Eden York & Christine Eaton
→ Permanent Makeup & Paramedical Revision
→ Brow Lamination & Tint
→ Lash Lift & Tint
→ Light-Cured Eyelash Extensions
• Permanent jewelry on-site by The Welded Row & Charm Bar

✨ 🥐 Enjoy light bites, skincare tips, giveaways, and a truly splendid summer refresh.

Botox appointments must be booked in advance to secure your time slot.
All other offerings — including permanent jewelry + beauty consultations — are drop-in friendly and first come, first served.

🌱 The Secret Garden of Beauty — where summer skin begins.
